code: import React,{useState}from"react";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const CampaignForm=_ref=>{let{onAdd}=_ref;const[campaignName,setCampaignName]=useState("");const[clientName,setClientName]=useState("");const[startDate,setStartDate]=useState("");const[status,setStatus]=useState("Active");const handleSubmit=e=>{e.preventDefault();if(!campaignName||!clientName||!startDate)return;onAdd({campaignName,clientName,startDate,status});setCampaignName("");setClientName("");setStartDate("");setStatus("Active");};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Campaign Name",value:campaignName,onChange:e=>setCampaignName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{placeholder:"Client Name",value:clientName,onChange:e=>setClientName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"date",value:startDate,onChange:e=>setStartDate(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("select",{value:status,onChange:e=>setStatus(e.target.value),children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Active"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Paused"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("option",{children:"Completed"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Add Campaign"})]});};export default CampaignForm;
